2010 Agenda

April 27, 2010

  • 7:30am 8:30am
    Registration and Breakfast
  • 8:30am 9:00am
    Welcome and Goals

    George Church

  • 9:00am 12:00pm
    Personal Genome Pioneers

    Moderated sharing of personal genome experiences and visions Pioneers: James Watson, Stephen Quake, Esther Dyson Henry Louis Gates, Misha Angrist, John West, Jay Flatley, Greg Lucier, Seong-Jim Kim, Rosalynn Gill, George Church, James Lupski Moderators: Robert Krulwich, Carl Zimmer (watch the videos, 12 parts)

  • 12:00pm  12:30pm
    Historic Group Photo by Justin Knight Photography
  • 12:30pm  1:45pm
    Lunch and Networking

    Congregate around themes

  • 1:45pm 2:30pm
    Breakout Sessions Pitches
  • 2:30pm 3:30pm
    Breakout Sessions

    Intimate discussions led by Personal Genome Pioneers and other thought leaders.

  • 3:30pm 3:45pm
    Coffee Break
  • 3:45pm 5:45pm
    Prototypes of the Future

    Prototypes of future genomic products, services, activities

  • 5:45pm 6:15pm
    Awards
  • 6:15pm 6:30pm
    Concluding Summary
  • 6:30pm 8:00pm
